forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this morning. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and becoming windy. High 17C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with gusty winds developing during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.
